segments.text: I notice the water is just pouring over the edge of the sink, and the woman doesn't even blink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit frustrated watching her ignore the obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is reaching for those cookies like they're the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the girl is being a bit sneaky, standing there with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why the woman doesn't hear the water splashing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is going to be a mess if she doesn't turn off the faucet soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is a scene of pure chaos, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in a view of a calm garden, which just makes the indoor scene even more ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think someone needs to intervene before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR
